content: हस्तिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हस्तः शुंडादंडोऽस्त्यस्य इनि] {@--1@} Having hands. {@--2@} Having a trunk. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} An elephant; <ls>Ms. 7. 96</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 43</ls>; (elephants are said to be of four kinds; भद्र, मंद्र, मृग, and मिश्र).

हस्तिनी {@--1@} A female elephant. {@--2@} A kind of drug and perfume. {@--3@} A woman of a particular class, one of the four classes into which writers on erotical science divide women (described as having thick lips, thick hips, thick fingers, large breasts, dark complexion, and libidinous appetite); the <ls>Ratimañjarī</ls> thus describes her:-- स्थूलाधरा स्थूलनितंबबिंबा स्थूलांगुलिः स्थूलकुचा सुशीला . कामोत्सुका गाढरतिप्रिया च नितांतभोक्त्री (नितंबखर्वा) खलु हस्तिनी स्यात् (करिणी मता सा) {8}
